channel.title: Next Model (update 5/6/13)
channel.description:
Thanks to captin D (allinall) heres a update...well just ventus keyblade
Heres the new base picture due to the last picture wasn't working [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zh028g.jpg[/img]
2D model (keychain is already made but no going to show) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33mu1yq.jpg[/img]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Well this weeken me and my friend will be making two models
I'll be making Ventus keyblade [img]http://i37.photobucket.com/albums/e58/nymphetamineBOY892/Keyblades/Ven27s_Keyblade.jpg[/img]'
And my friend will be make Aqua's keyblad [img]http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/1111/380353-aqua_s_keyblade.jpg[/img]
After making these two models we will be working on the armor pieces and soon the minigame. Well thats all see ya

[/quote]
Well welcome to life I said this weekend which I meant I would start and plus I have a life…work and school <.< and a social life and plus i have to work on my server, so stop being picky. I’ll post it when I’m done[/quote]

item.title: Next Model (update 5/6/13)
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

keyblades are very good models to make that allow you to work with the lighting and coloring options. tinker a little bit to see what you can come up with. and js beveling can be a modelers best friend if using meta so keep this in mind. just some Ccs ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Next Model (update 5/6/13)

item.description:

Aqua’s keyblade was the first model I ever made. Good luck to the both of you!
[/quote]
Wanderer can you send him your Aqua’s blade, I’m not that good at modeling and don’t feel up to making it.[/quote]
I have no idea where that model is. It’s close to 4 years since I made that and probably isn’t even on this computer. You’d have to search for the topic.

Read full topic
